text:
Calvin Anele Ngcongca (21 October 1987 – 23 November 2020) was a South African professional footballer. He played for AmaZulu before his death.
He made 53 appearances for the national team between 2009 to 2016.
On 23 November 2020, Ngcongca died in a car accident on the N2 highway in KwaZulu-Natal at the age of 33.
